description:
Facebook ads can be a great way to attract viewers to your website or your Facebook page. This course will teach you the basics of creating and managing Facebook ads.

Learn how to create ads in just minutes. Beyond the very basics you will learn how to laser target your ads so that your ideal potential customer sees them. Learn how to use read the reports to measure the effectiveness of your ads and track conversions.

After 9 clear and concise lessons you will be able to create and manage your own Facebook advertising campaigns and track their success.

Course consists of:

  • 9 video lectures.
  • 9 corresponding PDF documents.
  • Quizzes for most lectures.
  • Group discussion questions for each lecture.
  • Daily interactions with instructor via discussion forums or email
title: Facebook Advertising - A Beginners Guide for Business Owners
